review: I love this little unit!  It arrived quickly and is a GREAT to use with an older "not Smart" tv.  The set-up was super simple and once you pair it with your wi-fi device, it streams Amazon Prime, Netflix and many other channels flawlessly on your tv. It is important to have an available plug outlet nearby though.  I love that it is portable and EASY to install on other devices...therefore I am able to take it back and forth to our beach house and am always able to "stream" my shows!  An added bonus is the remote which is SO easy to use!  This unit seemed faster and easier to set-up than our older Roku streaming device.  I am very happy with my new Fire Stick; the price is very reasonable and would highly recommend.
